item.title: Backend Technology: The Foundation of Software Construction
item.description: 1. Backend Technology Backend technology refers to the technologies used to build websites, applications, and other software. It is responsible for handling server-side logic and data storage to support the functionality of the front-end user interface. In simple terms, the front end is like the visible part of an iceberg above the water surface, providing users with a visual interactive interface. At the same time, the backend is the submerged body of the iceberg, providing robust support and data processing capabilities to the front end.
